pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, January 13, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Norway, Erna Solberg.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.
